lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: Who was the Pharisee who came to talk to Jesus?
Jesus said, 'To enter God's kingdom, you must...' what?
What did Nicodemus say about being born again?
answers: You can't go back inside your mother
I don't want to be a baby again

questions.text: What is the invisible part of you that makes you... you?
What did King David say about us when we're babies?
answers: We're sinners even inside our mother's belly
We become sinners on our first birthday

questions.text: How is being born again like the wind?
answers: You can't see it with your eyes, but you can see what it changes
It makes you feel very cold

questions.text: How does the story of the snake on a pole point to Jesus?
answers: Both the snake and Jesus were lifted up and saved people
Both stories happened in the wilderness
Jesus also held up a snake on a pole

questions.text: What does Jesus tell us to do to receive eternal life?
answers: Try to be a good person

questions.text: Can you make yourself be 'born again'?
Who is the one who can bring our dead, sinful souls to life?
